item.title: My vote command only works for admin+ help!
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

In you case:

if(c.playerRights >= 1 || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("mikee")) {

This meaning commands under this line will work for Rights with 1 and ‘Mikee’. You can put the command under the ‘Yell’ command.

Read full topic

item.source: My vote command only works for admin+ help!

item.title: My vote command only works for admin+ help!
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Liru:

Well, you probably haven’t closed the command properly, above the command you just made have you added a } before adding this one?

I’m sure that would cause a error.

I looked at the Commands.Java you sent me earlier, and found that you had put it under Staff Rights. You need to put the command under a regular command (for regular members).

Read full topic
